organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Of the 73 teams in the six power conferences Northwestern, Oregon State, Rutgers and U.S.F. have the longest N.C.A.A. tournament droughts.
snippet: Of the 73 teams in the six power conferences Northwestern, Oregon State, Rutgers and U.S.F. have the longest N.C.A.A. tournament droughts.
